data.author: Soichiro Honda
data.quote: It wasn’t necessary to be born a nobleman or rich to succeed in life.

data.author: Soichiro Honda
data.quote: I just wouldn’t give in, no way.

data.author: Soichiro Honda
data.quote: If you make a superior product, people will buy it.

data.author: Soichiro Honda
data.quote: Profound belief in something allows every individual to find an immense inner force, and to overcome his or her failings.

data.author: Soichiro Honda
data.quote: You don’t measure a man’s greatness by his physical size, but by his acts, by the impact he makes on human history.

data.author: Soichiro Honda
data.quote: I would have to put in the necessary time, but nothing could stop me from succeeding.

data.author: Soichiro Honda
data.quote: Real happiness lies in the completion of work using your own brains and skills.

data.author: Soichiro Honda
data.quote: There are qualities which lead to success. Courage, perseverance, the ability to dream and to persevere.

data.author: Soichiro Honda
data.quote: I let no one disturb my concentration… Even hunger could not disturb me.

data.author: Soichiro Honda
data.quote: A diploma is by no means a sure ticket to life.

data.author: Soichiro Honda
data.quote: I don’t give a damn for the diploma. What I want is the knowledge.

data.author: Soichiro Honda
data.quote: When you fail, you also learn how not to fail.

data.author: Soichiro Honda
data.quote: Racing improves the breed.

data.author: Soichiro Honda
data.quote: The laboratory of a factory is the best place to learn about failure!

data.author: Soichiro Honda
data.quote: A company is most clearly defined not by its people or its history, but by it’s products.

data.author: Soichiro Honda
data.quote: Success is 99% failure.

data.author: Soichiro Honda
data.quote: If I’d had to manage my company myself, I would have very quickly gone bankrupt.

data.author: Soichiro Honda
data.quote: My biggest thrill is when I plan something and it fails. My mind is then filled with ideas on how I can improve it.

data.author: Soichiro Honda
data.quote: Hope, makes you forget all the difficult hours.

data.author: Soichiro Honda
data.quote: I enjoy working, and it isn’t because I’m president that I would deprive myself of that pleasure!
